items.sentence: We need to find out if Tom can speak French.

Tom doesn\'t speak French, and neither do I.

Tom made it clear that I shouldn\'t do that.

Tom was disappointed in Mary\'s performance.
Didn\'t you know that Tom didn\'t like Mary?
I don\'t know when my father will come back.
I don\'t know whether I should laugh or cry.
I don\'t know why Tom is always complaining.
I don\'t know why the meeting was postponed.
I don\'t remember getting paid for the work.
She has been dating him for about two years.
She makes him do his homework before dinner.

She spends all her time thinking about boys.
She thought that he was wasting electricity.

Tom is the only person who can do this work.
Tom is the tallest boy on our football team.
